lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ 2-2 record since Jamal  Crawford’s injury fails to reflect how much the Knicks miss him — in particular, how much Eddy Curry and Stephon Marbury miss him.
snippet: The Knicks’ 2-2 record since Jamal  Crawford’s injury fails to reflect how much the Knicks miss him — in particular, how much Eddy Curry and Stephon Marbury miss him.
